result.reason: Feature request to visually indicate disconnected RDP sessions in the connection tree, leveraging existing connection status tracking infrastructure
result.approach: Add a disconnected state indicator to the connection tree by detecting RDP session disconnects via the existing RDP event handlers and updating the connection node icon/tooltip to reflect disconnected sessions, allowing users to see which RDP sessions were disconnected without being fully closed
